item.title: 洛杉矶大火考验惯于抵御灾难的债券市场
item.description: 市政债务有一个不争的事实：债券很少因自然灾害而变动。在上周洛杉矶的大火烧毁了数千处房产之前，这一久经考验的理念一直有效。【原文：There’s a truism in municipal debt: Bonds rarely move on natural disasters. That long-tested concept had held up until fires destroyed thousands of properties in Los Angeles last week.】

item.title: 融资成本上升，美国住宅建筑商销售预期下滑
item.description: 本月，美国住宅建筑商对销售前景的乐观情绪有所减弱，因为抵押贷款利率飙升可能会吓到购房者。【原文：US homebuilders grew less upbeat this month about sales prospects as surging mortgage rates risk spooking buyers.】

item.title: 世界上最大的新闻都与媒体有关
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 私募股权基金长期持有的资产面临困境
item.description: 私募股权公司通过转移资产来争取更多时间让投资取得成功的策略开始出现疲软迹象。【原文：Private equity firms’ strategy of shuffling assets to buy more time for investments to pan out is starting to show signs of weakness.】

item.title: 尼日利亚对经济区采取强硬措施以促进出口
item.description: 尼日利亚计划对其在非洲人口最多的国家运营的数十个自由关税区进行彻底改革，以打击滥用行为。【原文：Nigeria plans to overhaul scores of free customs zones it operates across Africa’s most populous nation to clamp down on misuse.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉（Mubadala）与格蒂尔（Getir）创始人因资产问题再次发生冲突
item.description: 土耳其快速杂货配送初创公司 Getir BV 创始人与其主要投资者穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：The latest round in the power struggle between the founders of Turkey’s quick grocery delivery startup Getir BV and its main investor Mubadala Investment Co. is set to come to a head in Amsterdam this weekend.】

item.title: 肯尼亚考虑出售主权美元债券以弥补日益增长的预算缺口
item.description: 尽管最近融资成本上升，肯尼亚仍计划利用国际投资者，发行主权美元债券，以应对不断扩大的预算缺口。【原文：Kenya plans to tap international investors and issue sovereign dollar bonds despite a recent increase in financing costs as it navigates a widening budget shortfall.】

item.title: 南非非法金矿中的死亡与绝望
item.description:
数百名非法矿工在地下被困数月之久，他们的困境凸显了非洲这个工业化程度最高的经济体中许多人所面临的绝望。【原文：

The plight of hundreds of illegal miners trapped underground for months highlights the desperation many face in Africa’s most industrialized economy.

】

item.title: 墨西哥零售商利物浦为收购诺德斯特龙出售美国债券
item.description: El Puerto de Liverpool SAB de CV 已开始销售美国投资级债券，以帮助为百货商店运营商诺德斯特龙公司（Nordstrom Inc.【原文：El Puerto de Liverpool SAB de CV has begun marketing US investment-grade bonds to help finance its portion of the deal to take department store operator Nordstrom Inc. private.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡总统首次访华吸引中国投资
item.description: 斯里兰卡总统阿努拉-库马拉-迪萨纳亚克自今年 9 月当选以来首次访问北京，吸引了来自中国的投资。【原文：Sri Lankan President Anura Kumara Dissanayake attracted investments from China on his first visit to Beijing since being elected in September.】

item.title: 信实电信业务支撑利润，业绩超出预期
item.description: 亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）控制的信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）公布的季度利润略好于预期，原因是电信资费上涨带来的收益抵消了石化业务的疲软。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd., controlled by billionaire Mukesh Ambani, posted a slightly better-than-expected quarterly profit, as gains from higher telecom tariffs offset the weakness in its petrochemical business.】

item.title: Airbnb 斥资数百万游说纽约放宽租房禁令
item.description: Airbnb 公司正在向纽约的两场政治活动投入数百万美元，以回击短租限制措施，这些限制措施在一年内使纽约市 80% 以上的房源下线。【原文：Airbnb Inc. is pouring millions into a pair of New York political campaigns as it pushes back against short-term rental restrictions that took more than 80% of its NYC listings offline within a year.】

item.title: CFA 二级通过率降至 39%，为大流行病以来最低
item.description: 由于选择推迟考试的考生通过考试的几率较低，特许金融分析师二级考试的通过率骤降至大流行病以来的最低点，低于十年来的平均水平。【原文：The pass rate for the second level of the chartered financial analyst test plunged to the lowest since the pandemic, falling below the decade average as candidates who choose to delay their exam face a lower chance of passing.】

item.title: 加拿大总统波利耶夫承诺撤销资本利得税改革
item.description: 加拿大保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利瓦尔（Pierre Poilievre）承诺，如果当选，将取消提高资本收益包含率的做法。【原文：Pierre Poilievre, leader of Canada’s Conservative Party, is promising to eliminate the increase to the capital gains inclusion rate if elected.】

item.title: 波兰行长偏向鹰派后维持利率不变
item.description: 在波兰央行行长上个月出人意料地转为鹰派言论后，波兰又一个月没有降息。【原文：Poland refrained from cutting interest rates for another month after the central bank governor’s rhetoric turned unexpectedly hawkish last month.】

item.title: 美国零售销售大幅增长，为稳健的假日季划上圆满句号
item.description: 美国 12 月份的零售销售额普遍增长，表明消费者需求强劲，为假日购物季画上了圆满的句号。【原文：US retail sales broadly advanced in December, indicating strong consumer demand to wrap up the holiday season.】

item.title: Sagard 将为零售投资者开设新的私募股权投资基金
item.description: 加拿大萨加德控股公司（Sagard Holdings Inc.【原文：Canada’s Sagard Holdings Inc. is starting a private equity fund for retail investors, the latest example of an alternative asset manager extending its reach beyond institutional investors and ultra-high net worth individuals.】

item.title: 任天堂将于四月发布新一代 Switch 2
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co., Ltd.）表示，它将于 4 月 2 日发布新一代 Switch 2，从而启动已有近 8 年历史的旗舰机型的退役进程。【原文：Nintendo Co. said it will reveal the next-generation Switch 2 on April 2, setting in motion the retirement of the nearly eight-year-old flagship model.】

item.title: 贝宁的美元债券标志着非洲今年的首次债务销售
item.description: 贝宁正准备为发行美元债券定价，为非洲今年首次发行主权债券创造条件。消息公布后，这个西非国家现有的欧元债券价格飙升。【原文：Benin is preparing to price a dollar-bond offering, setting the stage for the first sovereign issuance out of Africa this year. The price of the West African nation’s existing eurobonds surged on the announcement.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员认为，如果基线得以维持，加大宽松力度是适当的
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）官员对其上一次政策决定的描述显示，如果消费者价格的发展符合预期，他们将进一步下调利率。【原文：European Central Bank officials judged that interest rates could be cut further if consumer prices develop in line with expectations, an account of their last policy decision showed.】

item.title: 南非政府考虑将国有企业上市
item.description: 南非政府表示，它正在与约翰内斯堡证券交易所密切合作，将该国陷入困境的国有企业在主要证券交易所上市，以促进投资。【原文：South Africa’s government said it is closely collaborating with the Johannesburg Stock Exchange about listing the nation’s struggling state companies on the main bourse, with a view toward fostering investment.】

item.title: U.S. Bancorp、PNC 预测第一季度 NII 将因贷款需求而减少
item.description: 两家最大的地区性银行对第一季度的净利息收入预测不高，因为利率下调将如何重振贷款需求还存在不确定性。【原文：The two biggest regional banks gave muted predictions for net interest income in the first quarter, amid uncertainty over how lower interest rates will revive lending demand.】

item.title: 俄罗斯燃料出口在美国实施新制裁前猛增
item.description: 在美国上周对俄罗斯能源行业实施新制裁之前，俄罗斯的精炼燃料出口量创下了 11 个月以来的新高，但迄今为止还没有迹象表明这些限制措施影响了石油产品的流通。【原文：Russia’s refined-fuel exports headed for an 11-month high before the US slapped fresh sanctions on the country’s energy sector last week, with no sign so far that the restrictions have impacted oil-product flows.】

item.title: 特朗普团队为俄罗斯协议和伊朗挤压准备石油制裁计划
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的顾问们正在制定一项范围广泛的制裁战略，以便在未来几个月内促成俄乌外交协议，同时挤压伊朗和委内瑞拉。【原文：Advisers to President-elect Donald Trump are crafting a wide-ranging sanctions strategy to facilitate a Russia-Ukraine diplomatic accord in the coming months while at the same time squeezing Iran and Venezuela, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 奈拉终于站稳脚跟的信心不断增强
item.description: 在奈拉兑美元汇率出现令人瞠目的下滑一年后，奈拉正享受着难得的稳定，分析人士预计这种稳定将持续下去。【原文：A year after an eyewatering slide against the dollar, the naira is enjoying a rare run of stability and analysts expect it to last.】

item.title: 瑞士国有银行邮政金融公司（PostFinance）以以太坊为赌注进军加密货币领域
item.description: 瑞士国有银行邮政金融公司（PostFinance AG）通过引入赌注扩大了其数字资产产品，允许第二大加密货币以太币的持有者赚取被动收入。【原文：Swiss state-owned bank PostFinance AG expanded its digital-asset offering by introducing staking, allowing holders of the second-biggest cryptocurrency Ether to earn passive income.】

item.title: 瑞银纳兰称印度经济放缓将持续，做空卢比
item.description: 瑞银集团要求投资者做空印度卢比，减持印度股票。【原文：UBS Group AG is asking investors to short India’s rupee and go underweight on the country’s stocks.】

item.title: 沙特顶级矿商 Maaden 考虑出售债券为扩张提供资金
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯最大的矿业公司正考虑在今年出售一笔国际债券，以帮助为一项超过 120 亿美元的投资计划提供资金，直至本十年结束。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s largest mining company is considering an international bond sale this year to help fund a more than $12 billion investment program through to the end of the decade.】
